original_title: An Evening with Lily Tomlin and Friends
overview: On January 22, 1993 at the historic Castro Theater in San Francisco, Lily Tomlin, Robin Williams, Harvey Fierstein, Marga Gomez, and Lypsinka performed a one-night only benefit for the making of the film The Celluloid Closet, both directed by Rob Epstein and Jeffrey Friedman.
tagline: Benefit for the making of the film The Celluloid Closet.
title: An Evening with Lily Tomlin and Friends
